items.sentence: How many times has Tom done that by himself?
I\'m sick and tired of all your complaining.
I\'m sick of doing the same thing every day.
Have you ever mentioned this to the teacher?
Have you put up your Christmas tree already?
Tom wasn\'t as hungry as I thought he\'d be.
Tom told me he\'d be at tomorrow\'s meeting.
Everyone knows that Tom has a thing for you.
How long have you been living in this house?
How much chocolate did you eat last weekend?
What made you think that Tom wouldn\'t come?
I finished cleaning my room a half hour ago.
I need your advice on what I should do next.
How was I to know Tom would change his mind?
I advised Tom not to go to Boston with Mary.
I had a raincoat on so I didn\'t get so wet.
You\'ve thought of everything, haven\'t you?
We weren\'t invited to the opening ceremony.
We\'ll try to get there as soon as possible.
What do you think happened to your suitcase?
